lead_paragraph: Until an agreement is reached on human growth hormone testing, the N.F.L. will use the performance-enhancing-drug policy from 2010.
snippet: Until an agreement is reached on human growth hormone testing, the N.F.L. will use the performance-enhancing-drug policy from 2010.
